thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Hotel Mercedes - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location. Really nice room
thread.title_full: Great location. Really nice room - Review of BEST WESTERN Hotel Mercedes, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kim P
title: Great location. Really nice room
text: Stayed here for 2 nights with my husband. The staff were really helpful, explaining how the Metro worked and how to get to all of the tourist attractions in the best time possible. The room we stayed in was small but had everything we needed and was clean and comfortable. The lift is hilariously teeny! Would stay here again, it's a 2 minute walk from the nearest metro station so great as a base for a quick trip to fantastic Paris.
